title: Global settings configuration
subtitle: These settings allows configuration of deal acceptance criteria.

numberOfStorageDealsPerHourField.label: Number of storage deals per hour*
numberOfStorageDealsPerHourField.tooltip: Max number of storage deals per hour across all clients.

cumulativeDealSizeForStorageField.label: Cumulative storage deal size per hour (GiB)*
cumulativeDealSizeForStorageField.tooltip: Max cumulative deal size per hour for storage deals across all clients.

retrievalDealsPerHourField.label: Retrieval deals per hour*
retrievalDealsPerHourField.tooltip: Max number of retrieval deals per hour across all clients.

customMessageField.label: Custom message
customMessageField.tooltip: This message will be sent to the client when a deal is rejected

acceptDealsFromUnkownClientsField.label: Accept storage deals from unknown clients
acceptDealsFromUnkownClientsField.tooltip: When deactivated, all storage deals from unknown clients are rejected.
